name: Yes, the Queen is the Best!
name_original: Yes, the Queen is the Best!
description:
The Queen of Seals must defend her kingdom from the menace that is Princess Seal!
To protect her rights as a ruler, she's challenged to... play a shooting game on stream?

A simple three-minute shooting game playable in a browser or on a phone. When you lose health, the Queen screams! When the Queen screams, she gets viewers! Get lots of viewers without dying first!
